Literature.Title: Solution structure of a novel tryptophan-rich peptide with bidirectional antimicrobial activity
Literature.Author: Wei SY, Wu JM, Kuo YY, Chen HL, Yip BS, Tzeng SR, Cheng JW

Literature.Title: Avian anticoccidial activity of a novel membrane-interactive peptide selected from phage display libraries.
Literature.Author: da Silva A Jr, Kawazoe U, Freitas FF, Gatti MS, Dolder H, Schumacher RI, Juliano MA, da Silva MJ, Leite A

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:2% Hemolysis=100 µg/ml,Rabbit erythrocytes:2% Hemolysis=100 µg/ml,Chicken erythrocytes:1% Hemolysis=100 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli(MIC=>125µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=>125µM),Micrococcus luteus(no activity data),Staphylococcus aureus(no activity data),Escherichia coli(no activity data),Candida albicans(MIC=12.5-25µg/ml),Aspergillus nidulans(MIC=25-50µg/ml),Trypanosoma cruzi(no activity data),Crithidia fasciculata(no activity data),Toxoplasma gondii(no activity data),Eimeria acervulina(70-80% Inhibition=1µg/ml),Eimeria acervulina(80-90% Inhibition=10-100µg/ml),Eimeria tenella(70-80% Inhibition=1µg/ml),Eimeria tenella(90-100% Inhibition=10-100µg/ml)
